data.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Two Pro Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Season Two Pro Pack includes all of tables and extra content released from Table Pack 11 through Table Pack 20 for a greatly discounted price!

This includes the pinball tables Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray™, Firepower™, Cactus Canyon™, Central Park™, White Water™, Space Shuttle™, Centaur™, Pin•Bot™, The Champion Pub™, Whirlwind™, Goin' Nuts™, Flight 2000™, Terminator 2: Judgment Day®, Tee’d Off™, Haunted House™, Victory™, Class of 1812™, El Dorado City of Gold™, and Cue Ball Wizard™ along with access to the Pro Menu of
Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray™, Cactus Canyon™, White Water™, Pin•Bot™, The Champion Pub™, Whirlwind™, Flight 2000™, Goin Nuts™, Terminator 2: Judgment Day®, Teed Off™, Class of 1812™, and Cue Ball Wizard™!

This pack also unlocks the Terminator 2 and Season Two custom balls.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
